Pre-Game Insights: Mexico is considered the favorite in the group, but needs to show its best form.
Ecuador has visibly grown on the international football scene and ranks 32nd in the FIFA rankings.
Jamaica has one of its most talented teams in years, with numerous players in the English Premier League at the peak of their powers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mexico's disappointing elimination in the group stage of the 2022 World Cup signalled a problem with its form.
Venezuela has been undefeated since the first round of World Cup qualifiers, having lost to Colombia then.
Others: The 2024 Copa America is a decisive moment for the Mexican national team.
A successful performance in the Copa America would restore confidence in the leadership ahead of their hosting of the 2026 World Cup.
The increase in the number of teams qualifying for the 2026 World Cup to a full six gives fans reason to dream.
